req1: stored train data shall be offered to the driver to be confirmed when data entry starts
req2: each railway shall have the possibility of allowing a different release speed for every signal

req1: partial supervision shall be selected either by the driver or by information received from track-to-train transmission

req1: the supervised shunting speed shall be indicated to the driver on request

req2: operation of the train trip shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: national values shall be applicable to a defined area
